item.title: Lunala
item.author: Muhamad Ihsan
item.description: Said to live in another world, this Pokémon devours light, drawing the moonless dark veil of night over the brightness of day.

item.title: Lycanroc
item.author: Muhamad Ihsan
item.description: It goads its enemies into attacking, withstands the hits, and in return, delivers a headbutt, crushing their bones with its rocky mane.

item.title: Primarina
item.author: Muhamad Ihsan
item.description: Its singing voice is its chief weapon in battle. This Pokémon’s Trainer must prioritize the daily maintenance of its throat at all costs.

item.title: Salazzle
item.author: Muhamad Ihsan
item.description: Filled with pheromones, its poisonous gas can be diluted to use in the production of luscious perfumes.

item.title: Vikavolt
item.author: Muhamad Ihsan
item.description: It produces electricity via an electrical organ in its abdomen. It overwhelms bird Pokémon with shocking beams of electrical energy.
